build i1120 + patch for bug 46894

disappeared except one (presumably the one doing the #create). Then I did a
Ctrl-Break in the console. This is the output.

Last comment on this bug...I promise.

No matter how many times I try and Cancel this operation, nothing happens.

When I try and start another checkout, the operation deadlocks.

Trying to create a new sample plug-in project resulted in a dialog stating: "A
thread with no contested locks caused deadlock." And the following in the log.

I'm going to collapse these together... we know something is still wrong, and
it's likely these are all side-effects of a single underlying bug.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47182 ***

traces.message: A thread with no contested locks caused dead lock.
